Hi John,

A few weeks back, I relaunched a small project of mine. It’s a simple repository of links to help others learn and read about webdesign.

You’ve made the list for being so awesome :)

Please see: http://www.webdesignrepo.com

Just wanted to say you’re doing, and have always done, a stellar job with the blog. Top notch!

Like I said, I really am just doing this to help people (I often see the same questions in the forums I visit over and over ie. ‘What design blogs should I follow?’). Of course, I expect nothing for this, but any amount of exposure you could offer, no matter how small or trivial it may seem, would be greatly appreciated :)

Keep up the fantastic work mate,

Sincerely,
